column4: Still havin probs trying to get a raid5 array set up, am going to have to go in and remove the installation and retry...  Gonna clear bios also

I am running a MSI K9N SLI Platinum Motherboard with 2 gigs of ram, and 5 maxtor sata 2 drives set in bios to go raid 5 and appearing there as a raid array but when I boot, they show up as sda thru sde????
Am trying to set up Dapper 64 alternate
those are the proper hardware devices
